text: Emotions is the second studio album by American singer and songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released on September 17, 1991. It featured a more dance feel to it than the pop-soul and R&B; of Carey's debut album Mariah Carey (1990). ==Track listing== ==Charts and certifications== ===Charts=== Chart Peak position Australian Albums Chart 8 Austrian Albums Chart 39 Canadian Albums Chart 5 Dutch Albums Chart 7 French Albums Chart 9 German Albums Chart 46 Italian Albums Chart 10 Japanese Albums Chart 3 New Zealand Albums Chart 6 Norwegian Albums Chart 8 Spanish Albums Chart Accessed 2010-08-13. 30 Swedish Albums Chart 13 Swiss Albums Chart 15 UK Albums Chart 4 US Billboard 200 4 US Billboard R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 6 ===Certifications=== Country (Provider) Certification (sales thresholds) Australia (ARIA) Platinum Canada (CRIA) 4× Platinum France (SNEP) Gold Netherlands (NVPI) Platinum New Zealand (RIANZ) Platinum Sweden (IFPI) Platinum Switzerland (IFPI) Gold United Kingdom (BPI) Platinum United States (RIAA) 4× Multi-Platinum === Singles === Year Single Peak chart positions Certifications (sales thresholds) US US R&B; US AC US Dance AUS AUT CAN FRA GER IRE ITA JAP NL NZ SPA SWE SWI UK 1991 "Emotions" 1 1 3 1 11 — 1 — 39 27 — 90 12 3 — 30 — 17 *NZ: Gold *US: Gold "Can't Let Go" 2 2 1 — 63 — 3 — — — — — 77 21 — 77 — 20 1992 "Make It Happen" 5 7 13 16 35 — 7 — — — — — 47 — — — — 17 "—" denotes releases that did not chart or was not released. == References == == Books == * * Category:Mariah Carey albums Category:1991 albums Category:Dance-pop albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Columbia Records albums
